definition: a small hole (usually round and finished around the edges) in cloth or leather for the passage of a cord or hook or bar
details:
noun
- a small hole (usually round and finished around the edges) in cloth or leather for the passage of a cord or hook or bar
= synonyms: eyelet
- a hole (in a door or an oven etc) through which you can peep
= synonyms: peephole, spyhole
